headline: ConocoPhillips (COP) Attracts Polianta Ltd With Expansion Strategy
summary: ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) is among the best safe stocks to buy now. In the second quarter, Polianta Ltd acquired a new position in ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) through the purchase of 14,500 shares of the company’s stock. According to the latest disclosure with the SEC, the investment of the firm in the company is around $1,301,000. What’s truly […]

headline: 3 US Integrated Energy Stocks to Gain Despite Industry Headwinds
summary: Softer crude prices, slowing production growth and mounting renewable demand are making the prospects for the Zacks Oil & Gas US Integrated industry gloomy. ConocoPhillips (COP), Occidental (OXY) and National Fuel (NFG) are well-positioned to survive the challenges.

headline: Asset Sale and Workforce Reduction Could Be a Game Changer for ConocoPhillips (COP)
summary: In September 2025, ConocoPhillips announced the sale of its Anadarko Basin assets for US$1.3 billion, a significant workforce reduction of up to 3,250 roles, and ongoing progress regarding its integration of Marathon Oil, all aimed at boosting margins, capturing over US$1 billion in synergies, and accelerating cost savings by 2026. This multi-pronged restructuring marks a concerted effort by the company to reduce debt, streamline its portfolio towards higher-margin assets, and position...
